body.name: Tineco iFLOOR 2 Complete Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum Floor Cleaner and Mop, One-Step Cleaning for Hard Floors, Great for Sticky Messes and Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 44 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 29 mins
features: CUT YOUR CLEANING TIME IN HALF – Vacuum and wash at the same time. The cordless floor washer is an effective way to clean wet and dry messes on multiple sealed hard floors, including hardwood, tile, laminate, vinyl, and marble.
ALWAYS CLEAN WITH FRESH WATER – The dual-tank system keeps clean and dirty water separate, so you’re always cleaning with fresh water and solution.
FAST AND STREAK-FREE DRYING – With up to 90% water recovery rate, iFLOOR 2 Complete leaves your floors completely dry and streak-free in a matter of minutes.
SELF-PROPULSION SYSTEM FOR EASY MANEUVERABILITY – With a self-propelled design that helps you to move freely, the lightweight iFLOOR 2 Complete can go anywhere, and clean any mess.
SELF CLEANING, EASY MAINTENANCE – Never touch a dirty roller again. The hands-free self-cleaning function automatically flushes the inner tubing and brush roller, for fast, mess-free maintenance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tineco iFLOOR 2 Complete Brings the Experience of Simultaneous Vacuuming and Mopping

Suitable for everyday quick cleaning Easy to carry and move and easily goes where you clean, and features up to 22 minutes of runtime. Dual Tank System The dual tank system separates the dirty water, so you're always cleaning with fresh water and solution. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used steam mops, vaccumes but never two in one. I like this one. Light, easy, seems like it’s working well, no chord. A little annoying to clean the parts after, but it’s a quick clean. Just be sure to air dry the mop roller and sponge completely before use again to have hold up longer. It’s only been a week so we shall see how long the item works well. But so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must have!
reviews.reviewText: The Tineco iFLOOR 2 Complete Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. As a pet owner, it effortlessly tackles the daily dirt and grime, ensuring my home stays clean and fresh. While I find the button on the handle for releasing more liquid a bit perplexing and not entirely necessary in my routine, the vacuum’s standout features more than make up for it.One of the highlights is its impressive ability to dry the floor after cleaning. This not only saves time but also prevents any slips or accidents. The self-cleaning feature is nothing short of amazing. It takes the hassle out of maintenance, allowing me to focus on the cleaning task at hand.As someone who uses this vacuum every single day, the ease of use and reliability make it a valuable investment. The Tineco iFLOOR 2 has truly transformed the way I approach daily cleaning in a pet-friendly household. Highly recommended for its efficiency and time-saving capabilities!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use (even my husband can do it). Not that great on rough tile in the bathroom or mudroom, but great on hardwood floors. Super quick drying time and easy to store and charge. Cleaning the products are a little confusing as far as taking everything apart and putting it back together, but it can be done. Super lightweight and easy to move from room to room. Usually one canister can clean 3-4 rooms depending on the size. Cleaning solution has a very mild, nice smell and not strong at all. I have gone from not hardly ever mopping my floors, to mopping them once a week (which is a win for me in a VERY busy home).I have a rainbow system and I love to use it to mop/vacuum. But it is bulky, heavy and has so many extensions and parts. With the Tineco, I can easily get it out and mop way quicker than I could my rainbow. I also like the trigger on the handle, that I can control how much water/solution comes out.If you are a busy mom that barely has time to wash and [dry] your hair, this product is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW!!!!! I’m amazed!!
reviews.reviewText: I am so thrilled with this purchase. I have been researching different wet/dry vacs for a while now and finally landed on this one. It is a big investment but the quality you are getting is amazing.Pros-No cord to trip overThe dirty water is separate from clean waterIt has a self clean feature (amazing)Leaves floors shiny and smelling good.Easy to clean when doneComes with extra roller brushComes with two bottles of cleaner (you only use a cap full each time if you choose)Pretty quiet when usingIt is easy to push2 year warrantyPicks up pet hair and human hair really well!!Cons:Finding a spot to store it and plug it in to chargeIt says it lasts 22 min on one charge. I was able to get my whole floor done no problem thoughCleaning it after takes a few minutes of extra timeIf you leave the water in it has a foul odorPriceSome people have said that the power on and off button gets turned off when they are cleaning. I did not have this problem. It is on the handle but my finger never touched it. It should not be a deal breaker.If you are debating on which wet/dry vac to get you won’t be sorry you got this one. I have loved using it and it is so much better than a swifter. My husband even noticed a difference with the floors and that is saying a lot. There are a lot more expensive models but this one works just fine! Also, if you can find it when it’s on sale…even better! Happy cleaning!!Edit 7/1/23Still love this vacuum!The self clean feature is amazing. Make sure you have water in there so it can self clean. I have mine in a closet and notice a little smell of you don’t dry completely. I just take the parts off and let them air dry before putting back on. Still would 100% recommend!Edit 9/19/23Still use this everyday and works amazing! So easy to keep my floors clean. This is a good investment!Edit 11/17/23Vacuum still works great! If you keep it clean it does not leave an oder. If you forget to change the dirty water out it can start to smell. Still very happy with this purchase and not sure how I kept my floors clean without it. It saves so much time!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little machine
reviews.reviewText: The Tineco was very easy to use and cleaned my floors wonderfully! Recommend for anyone with hardwood/laminate or tile floors. Works like a charm.
Si estás buscando una aspiradora como la dyson la verdad está marca es buena la verdad te da precio calidad, aspira muy bien y trapea excelente, es muy buena inversión

Esa tiene o es la mejor compra que he hecho, no me arrepiento de haberla elegido es muy buena aspira todo lo que encuentra y al mismo trapea, nunca imaginé lo sucio que podía estar mi piso y al usarla quede sorprendida de toda la suciedad que saca, se limpia sola y lo hace bien es fácil de usar y no es muy pesada, además me la enviaron desde USA y llegó rápido excelente compra estoy feliz!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Es buena opción para mantener limpio
reviews.reviewText: Es practica ya que en una sola intención aspira y trapea, pero el deposito es muy pequeño, tengo que hacer la limpieza en 2 partes ya q la pila solo aguanta para la parte de arriba que son 2 baños y 3 recamaras y la tengo q cargar nuevamente para hacer la parte de abajo, no es muy apta para mis escaleras, en las esquinitas no aspira al 100, considero sirve solo para mantenimiento diario de la casa pero al final tendré q hacer limpieza profunda con mi otra aspiradora y el trapeado, no es el wow q esperaba pero funciona para mantener el piso limpio en lo que se hace limpieza profunda, quito bastante bien manchas de agua pero no quita cosas pegadas al piso, su mantenimiento es fácil, no cuesta trabajo manipularla, lo q me gustó mucho es que es super ligera al aspirar, se va sólita y eso siento que facilita y menos fatiga

Lei muchas de las publicaciones pero ninguna le dio al clavo al decir que trabaja sin tanto esperar, rapido y si tienen mascotas recoge los pelos que ha simple vista no existen, deja los pisos brillantes, el unico inconveniente el costo del liquido limpiador per uso otro similar y no se queja la maquina ni mi bolsillo, jejeje, excelente producto, lo recomiendo al 100%
